let the priests <S%H3548><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> it to them <S%H376><s%>, every man from his acquaintance <S%H4378><s%>; and they shall repair <S%H2388><s%> the breaches <S%H919><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, wheresoever any breach <S%H919><s%> shall be found <S%H4672><s%>.

But it was so <S%H7969><s%>, that in the three and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Jehoash <S%H3060><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> had not repaired <S%H2388><s%> the breaches <S%H919><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>.

Then Hazael <S%H2371><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Gath <S%H1661><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> it <S%H2371><s%>; and Hazael set <S%H7760><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
